0_instruction: Waypoints allow you to fast travel freely across Sanctuary. Activate waypoints as you explore to expand your waypoint options.
1_instruction: You can {c_highlight}earn Renown by completing various activities{/c} across the continent.
2_instruction: Obtaining Renown will grant rewards and certain thresholds. View the status of your Renown for each region from the Map {hotkey:Map}
title: Exploring Sanctuary
